tudarmstadt.lt.ABSentiment

Class AbSentiment

  • java.lang.Object
    • tudarmstadt.lt.ABSentiment.AbSentiment

  • public class AbSentiment
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstraction class for the Aspect-based Sentiment Analysis. Processes text input.

      • analyzeText

        public Result analyzeText(java.lang.String text)
        Analyzes an input string. Runs a NLP pipeline, then the classifiers.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        a structured Result

                                      Result res)
        Extracts aspect expressions from a CAS.
        Parameters:
        cas - the CAS containing AspectTarget annotations
        res - the Result, where the expressions are added
